name: api-testing-framework
description: Modern advanced REST API testing framework with Postman - featuring performance testing, security checks, contract validation, and multi-API support
author: Rudra

scripts.test: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:json-placeholder: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/json-placeholder-results.json
scripts.test:performance: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/performance-results.json
scripts.test:security: newman run "API Testing Framework - Security.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:all-apis: npm run test:json-placeholder && npm run test:other-apis
scripts.test:other-apis: newman run "API Testing Framework - Multi-API.postman_collection.json" -e "Multi-API.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:contracts: newman run "API Testing Framework - Contracts.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:workflows: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --folder "Workflows" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:load: newman run "API Testing Framework - Load Tests.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --iteration-count 10 --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/load-results.json
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run test:security && npm run test:contracts
scripts.report: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export results/api-test-report.html
